name: Escape from Castle Crimson
description:
"Katty wakes up in a large castle about to be sacrificed by zombie cultists. Can she make it out alive?"

Made during the 2016 Global Game Jam.

Credits

Juuso Ervasti - Art, Design, "Programming"

Music - Matti McCambridge

Editorial

The game can be played in a browser but it's incompetent as heck. I suggest you watch the video playthrough instead.

You have to memorize the entire level layout if you hope to survive and when you die you have to refresh the browser or the song will overlap.

There's an ammo limit but no ammo counter. However a single bullet will kill everything in it's path and go through walls. 

Jumping is the floatiest there is and none of the characters have animations.

The music is absolutely killer though.
